comment: Good riddance to Amber Turd, purge the ACLU. It needs new management
commentable_entity.ask: Drop Amber Heard from ACLU ambassador.
commentable_entity.title: Drop Amber Heard from ACLU ambassador.
commentable_entity.description: Amber Heard should NOT be a part of ANY organization that represents domestic violence victims of ANY nature. Amber Heard and her clearly FALSE allegations of being a domestic violence survivor has been highly damaging to those of us that have truly SURVIVED these brutal crimes. Men can be and ARE domestic violence survivors as well and they should NOT held to a lower standard for being a victim. The ACLU knew this op-ed was about Johnny Depp AND conspired with Amber Heard to further inflict damage on Depp. For that, the ACLU should be held accountable all the same.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Drop Amber Heard from ACLU ambassador.
commentable_entity.display_title: Drop Amber Heard from ACLU ambassador.
commentable_entity.petition_title: Drop Amber Heard from ACLU ambassador.

comment:
I believe Johnny! Amber’s story has way too many inconsistencies. She has been proven to be a pathological liar and is capable of doing anything! Amber is psycho!
She has ruined it for real domestic abuse victims by lying — setting back  the movement against domestic violence. 
SHAME on YOU AMBER!!!!!!
